item.title: May and December
item.dc:creator: Frank Parks
item.description: Only seventeen, it was a forgone conclusion that she would marry Norton Terry, more than three times her age. But when he dies in agony, exhibiting all the symptoms of poisoning by arsenic, will it be a simple case of murder for inheritance, or is there a deeper motive?

item.title: The Runaway
item.dc:creator: Al Peters
item.description: The madame, who is a good many years younger than the master, has completely disappeared. The master's disposition is jealous; he was very jealous of the madame, because of his nature and because she, being much younger than he, liked to go out and enjoy herself, dancing and the like.

item.title: The Letter in the Mail
item.dc:creator: Alfred Plowman
item.description: Confession may be good for the soul but when bank clerk Philip Moore confesses his crime to his boss, will he find redemption or death?

item.title: Nice Corpses Like Flowers
item.dc:creator: J. B. Hawley
item.description: The only clue was a gilt letter U clutched in the dead man's stiffening fingers!

item.title: A Weapon of the Law
item.dc:creator: George W. Breuker
item.description: Facing a man he sentenced to 10 years in prison, can Judge Lathrop outwit a desperate man bent on revenge?

item.title: The Man Who Would Not Die
item.dc:creator: Harold Ward

image.title: The Man Who Would Not Die

item.description: What is death, my dear inspectors? Who knows? No one but me. What is the human body? Only a prison in which the soul is confined — a piece of clay to be discarded at will. God kills when he wishes. Why not I? It suited my purpose to use the mortal form of Mrs. Winters, and I took it.

item.title: The Summons
item.dc:creator: Henry Altimus
item.description: Scofield Carrington was dead but his call bell kept ringing. Who was the old man calling from beyond the grave?

item.title: The Ruse in Cocaine Alley
item.dc:creator: William Mahoney
item.description: Corey knows the one of men in the room at Sammy Modell's place is guilty but can he outwit the crook and prove it?

item.title: The Georgetown Mystery
item.dc:creator: William Wallace Major
item.description: Hell's a-pop- pin' down here. They's bin a murder committed, mebbe two.

item.title: Planned by the Stars
item.dc:creator: C. S. Montanye
item.description: "Murder!" She said quietly. "At midnight you come upon this earth and at midnight the stars plan that you shall be removed from it."
